description: Example resume data structure that May generates and stores

masterResume.name: Will Dubbs

experience.title: Product Management and Innovation MBA Intern – Ads and Sponsorships Team
bullets: Built Python + LLM Reddit AI Agent tool analyzing 4,685+ users, enabling $500K in new sponsorship deals by quantifying previously unmeasurable customer insights

Standardized AI-powered social listening across 4 platforms during CFB26 launch, quantifying sponsor performance impact of 250K-5M additional brand views, leading to adoption by live service ad-tech teams
Automated social listening workflows, resulting in enhanced reporting for 7 sponsors and $20k savings

experience.title: MBA Intern – AI Product Manager
bullets: Led visual design for Customer Support portal and AI-powered content discovery system, establishing design language and interactive Figma prototype for AI GovTech start up
Led 5 user interviews and feedback loops to validate hypotheses and designed product roadmap to guide launch strategy

experience.title: Associate Director, Commercial Operations - Bioinformatics Product Manager
bullets: Managed cross-functional team of 15 across product, engineering, and operations, securing 3 pilot contracts for disruptive biosecurity international public health products including AI powered genomic analysis
Developed 0-to-1 product strategy through customer interviews and supply chain financial analysis, reducing operational costs by 10% and preventing $10K+ revenue loss through improved logistics
Built multi-year value proposition analysis, securing leadership buy-in and Ukrainian support, resulting in $1.6M annual renewals

masterResume.skills: Python, SQL, R, Asana, Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, Tableau, Excel, PowerPoint, Agile, A/B Testing

notes: This structure is stored in localStorage under 'may_master_resume'
The chatbot builds this incrementally through conversation
Stage 2 takes this structure and tailors it for specific jobs
The DOCX generator uses this exact structure to create Word documents
